name: Mogo Invasion
description:
Long long ago, in the northwest corner of the empire, terrible orca and evil mage invaded a small town and only thing that you, as the lord, have to do, is defense! defense!! defense!!!

From the team of militia and hunter, to fairchild, celestial soldiers or even the Thor, you can use different pairs to resist monsters’ invasion. Besides, diversified gameplay such as protecting warriors, face-off war and developing arms will bring you unique gaming experience.

There are more than 20 types of enemies like toxic spider, hell cheetah and angry ox king, making the game more challenging. Due to 30 kinds of "hero" with respective function and coins as capital of your army’s research and development, you will embrace stronger equipment. If you think you're strong enough, please try to infinite levels to challenge the impossible battle of wits!!
